Title: iPilot
Plot: Carly's teacher, Ms. Briggs puts her in charge of the school talent show. After Freddie uploads the auditions, hosted by Carly and Sam, to the Internet, it becomes a huge sensation. So Carly and her friends decide to create a weekly variety show.
GuestStars: Nate Hartley (Jeb),  Colin Spensor (Wesley),  Donna Pieroni (Woman With Dog),  Tim Russ (Principal Franklin),  Eli Vargas (Sam's Victim),  Tyger Rawlings (Myron),  Angelyna Martinez (Mother in Lobby)
